reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and of good quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have
items.body: This dress was absolutely stunning. Definitely a great buy. True to size and Quality was great. Read more
items.author: Kelly McNichol

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Prom
items.body: This dress was really pretty, we only sent it back because my daughter didn’t like how it fit in the middle. But it was very pretty and we received quickly. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This dress was better than I imagined. It was exactly what my daughter was looking for and it was a fraction of the price of the other dresses we looked at. I loved it. She loved it! I’m so pleased!! Read more
items.author: cat

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh
items.body: fit weird, let my sister wear it she loved it. the tail is a little funky. Read more
items.author: Amber McMannus

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: My 16 year old daughter wanted an orange dress for her winter ball. We couldn't find one in stores and took a chance on this one. You never know what you are getting buying a dress online but this was a really pleasant surprise. It was gorgeous in person and worth every penny! Read more
items.author: jersey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit a little big
items.body: Very pretty! But fit just a little big Read more
items.author: Really cute ! Just as described

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Beautiful dress pink/shimmer true to size and color. The dress has attached inner slip . Allowing the dress to be comfortable. The material light weight and made well. Read more
items.author: carol

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Mermaid Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Mermaid Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B-mint, B-gold, B-rose Gold, B-gray, B-silver, B-dusty Rose, B-black, B-blush Pink, B-champbgne, B-teal, B-yellow, B-turquoise, B-lavender, B-royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
